...浮雕蛋螺（学名：Nerita exuvia），是原始腹足目蛋螺科蛋螺属的一种。主要分布于印度尼西亚、台湾，常栖息在潮间带。cite web|url=http://shell.sinica.edu.tw/chinese/shellbase_detail.php?science_no=191|.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin, literally animal skins, spoils of the enemy', from exuere 'divest oneself of'

means.word_mean: 1. cast-off skins or coverings of various organisms during ecdysis
